title: Kendra Scott Mallory Pendant Necklace
features: Made in the USA or Imported
Bring color and vibrant fun to your style wearing the Kendra Scott Mallory Pendant Necklace. Carved stones pay an homage to our iconic medallion on its 10 year anniversary, no two alike.
Please refer to color selection for stone detail.
14K gold, 14K rose gold, rhodium, or bright silver - all plated over brass.
Lobster clasp with single adjustable sliding bead.
description: Bring color and vibrant fun to your style wearing the Kendra Scott Mallory Pendant Necklace. Carved stones pay an homage to our iconic medallion on its 10 year anniversary, no two alike. Please refer to color selection for stone detail. Kendra Scott trademark etched frame. 14K gold, 14K rose gold, rhodium, or bright silver - all plated over brass. Lobster clasp with single adjustable sliding bead. Remove jewelry when washing your hands, swimming, exercising, cleaning, or styling your hair, as soaps, chlorine, detergents, cleaning agents, and hair products can remove the plating. Imported.
